amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the Federal Emergency Management Agency by $50 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for election activities under FEMA by $50 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Millender-McDonald amendment (A035) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 227 (Roll no. 58).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A035) offered by Ms. Millender-McDonald.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
